job description:
Senior Data Scientist - Python
If you are a Senior Data Scientist with 6+ years of experience, please read on!

Do you want to work for one of the leading consulting firms in the US? Look no further, we have a top tier practice based right in the heart of midtown and we work with industry titans to provide the best solutions to complex problems. Our building is within eye-shot of Rockefeller Plaza, so you could be able to see the holiday festivities from your desk!

What You Will Be Doing
  • Working with the best and the brightest to work on projects for large companies
  • Using data manipulation and analysis best practices programming with Python
  • Provide industry experience and technical expertise for design assistance
  • Interact with clients and present findings
What You Need for this Position
  • PhD in Computer Science, Statistic, Mathematics, or Physics
  • 6+ years of experience in the machine learning and big data field
  • 2 years of experience with AdTech
  • Experience with High-transaction database architecture (SQL and NoSQL)
  • Adept knowledge of the following: Python, MongoDB, Linux, AWS, NLP
What's In It for You
  • Vacation/PTO
  • Medical / Dental / Vision
  • Bonus
  • 401k
  • Upward mobility
So, if you are a Data Scientist with 6+ years of experience, please apply immediately for this amazing opportunity!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
